about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in Ostera: The curse of..., a hilarious narrative game where magic goes as haywire as your villagers! Set in an absurdly humorous medieval-steampunk world, take on the role of a village chief desperate to lift a curse and save his people from impending disaster.

You've become their leader, and they've got problems! From simple neighborhood quarrels to political conflicts, everything now depends on you!

Guided by Nicolas, a facetious god, explore unique locations, solve fascinating mysteries and make choices that will influence the fate of your community.

  • Manage: You've become their leader, and they've got problems! From simple neighborhood quarrels to political conflicts, it's all up to you now!

  • Explore: At the end of the day, get up from your seat and dive into a zany investigation to find a way to stop the curse.

  • Fight: Your adventures will be littered with obstacles, monsters and sometimes even... children! It's up to you to fight hard or fight smart...

Inspired by Terry Pratchett's “Discworld”, the absurd situations of “Monthy Python” and games such as “Yes your Grace” and “Reigns”, Ostera: The curse of... is the first opus in an offbeat universe just waiting for you!

Ostera invites you to immerse yourself in an epic journey where every decision counts. Join the adventure, add Ostera to your wishlist, and get ready to laugh, think and maybe even... save your village.
